name: PlugMaster
description:
This is a hyper-casual mobile game with highly customizable elements and an original idea and unique gameplay.

Resize plugs to match the size of falling pins. React faster as they will fall faster over time. Can you make the longest multi-way plug and beat your friend's best score? Customize every part by unlocking your favorite skins in the shop.

Put aside some minor bugs, compatibility issues with some aspect ratios and not having many items in the shop, this game is almost ready to be published in Google Play and App Store. If you want to be the publisher of this game, contact me at hess.gha@gmail.com

This game has been made during a game jam in a group of 2. Credits of the idea and art goes to my friend @MPowend. Programming, project managing, making SFX etc. has been done by me, @HEGworks.

The BGM is "A Journey Awaits" by Pierre Bondoerffer (@pbondoer) from OpenGameArt
